ygData.subject: borrowFile Timeout waiting for idle object
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear IA-Team, during my last crawl I ve been experiencing the death of one of my heritrix instances. I ll share my experiences, maybe someone can help me

Dear IA-Team,

during my last crawl I've been experiencing the "death" of o=
ne of my
heritrix instances. I'll share my experiences, maybe someone can h=
elp
me finding the cause of it.
First something about my setup: I'm running=
 identical heritrix setups
on multiple machines (currently two heritrix ins=
tances per machine).
The config I'm using is a config I've been using for q=
uite a while
without running into any problems.
Now a few days ago one of m=
y machines stoped harvesting data, so I
became curious what happend. this i=
s what the log told me:

the first thing that happend were lots of entries =
like:
12/29/2006 11:56:09 +0000 WARNING org.archive.io.WriterPool borrowFil=
e
Timeout waiting for idle object: Retry #10 of  max of 10: NSEE Pool
State=
: Active 0 of max 1, idle 1,
time 300028ms of max 300000ms

s message for each of my 100 toe threads:

This Rob=
otstxtArchiver is a 2nd ARC-Writer I'm using to keep track of
all the robot=
s.txt I encounter. This problem only happend once so far.
Only on one insta=
nce on one machine (so the 2nd heritrix instance on
the same machine didn't=
 suffer from the same problem).

Any ideas or helpful thoughts?

Regards
